page.title: 12FARMS SEERGREEN CHALFONT
page.content: NO LONGER USED AS FARMS:- Stockings, Rawlings,Austens are residential. Misbourne - Wastepaper.Narcot - Grey hounds.Track being improved.10 dogs, hoping to breed & increase. Windmill - Racing Stables.Widmer,Top Farm -Livery The Willows - unable to find anything. WORKING FARMS Dibden Hill 10acres 800pigs 10steers. Bramleys 5acres no crops 3ponies 1goat 3chickens 1gander Highclere 15acres hay 1600chickens 75 ducks 1cow 2calves Brentford Grange 180acres wheat & barley 20acres grass, 75 dairy cows,75 beef cattle,500 pigs. Upper Bottom House Farm 210acres corn, barley,kale,sweetcorn,potatoes,greens. 80 cows,6 calves,26 pigs,6 goats,2 kids 1 horse,1 donkey. Bowles Farm 50acres.Sheep and cattle. Mill Farm no crops,chickens,60beef cattle.
